articles.title: DPRK's Army and People Pledge to Take Revenge on U.S., S. Korean Puppet Forces
articles.content:
DPRK's Army and People Pledge to Take Revenge on U.S., S. Korean Puppet Forces
						
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces have stepped up confrontation moves against the DPRK over its legitimate satellite launch and nuclear test. They are now staging Foal Eagle joint military exercises, kicking up war hysteria.
					 This has touched off the pent-up resentment of the service personnel and people of the DPRK and compelled them to harden their pledge to take thousand-fold retaliation against the enemies.
					
					 Korean People's Army Officer Ri Chol Hak told KCNA:
					
					 Foal Eagle is a drill for invading the DPRK and a drill for a nuclear war. 
					
					 The war rehearsal started by the enemies despite the DPRK's repeated warnings is the height of their hostile acts against it and an open declaration of a war.
					
					 The powerful striking means of the DPRK including nuclear deterrence for justice are waiting for the order of launch while taking a good aim at the strongholds of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces and dens of anti-DPRK smear campaign.
					
					 The artillery firing drill conducted in the presence of Supreme Commander Marshal Kim Jong Un proved that KPA does not make an empty talk and the aggressors can never escape from its merciless strike.
					
					 Once there starts the exchange of fire, enemies will face only ruin and death and the DPRK will win a victory.
					
					 Pak Un Gyong, worker of the Phyongchon District Post Office, noted that even though they call the drills "defensive" and "annual" the enemies can never cover up the true picture of the unpardonable criminal act of bringing the danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 Ri Un Chol, student of Kim Chol Ju University of Education, said as follows:
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK grown under the care of peerlessly great men will counter the fire with fire and deal decisive and merciless blows at the aggressors.
					
					 No force on earth can bar the DPRK from advancing by sounding the nuclear-thunder of independence in the spirit of the great Paektusan nation.
					
					 If the enemies make a slightest sign of provocation, I will volunteer to the front again to show them what the arms of justice and retaliation will be like with the matchless grit and pluck shown by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Jon Kwang Su, member of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards of Mangyongdae District, said as follows in an excited tone:
					
					 Our civilian defence forces have the striking capability for sweeping away the aggressors in the all-people war of resistance along with the invincible revolutionary Paektusan army.
					
					 The world will clearly see those who kindled the fire face the miserable fate of destruction and defenders of justice win final victory.
					
					 Once Marshal Kim Jong Un issues an order, we will mercilessly punish the enemies with the arms of Mt. Paektu and successfully accomplish the cause of national reunification.

articles.title: New Poems Encourage DPRK People in Face-off with U.S.
articles.content:
New Poems Encourage DPRK People in Face-off with U.S.
						
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Poets of the Central Committee of the Writers Union of Korea have created a number of poems giving courage and strength to the people in an all-out showdown with the U.S. imperialists.
					 Among them are poems "Sky of Korea" and "We Will Cover Sky with Our Satellites", which reflect the firm will of the DPRK servicepersons and people to fully display the might of the DPRK by launching more satellites.
					
					 Poems "Korea Replies" and "Voice of Korea" show the DPRK people's unshakable faith and will to continue the Songun policy so as to defend the national dignity and sovereignty, regarding them as valuable as their own lives.
					
					 There are also poems titled "We Condemn U.S. Imperialists to Death" and "We Have Launched Nuclear Blast", which vividly represent the Korean army and people's resolve to deal a crushing blow to the U.S. imperialists and their followers getting hell-bent on the hostile policy toward the DPRK over its peaceful satellite launch and self-defensive measure for bolstering up its nuclear deterrent.

articles.title: New Postage Stamps Issued in DPRK
articles.content:
New Postage Stamps Issued in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The State Stamp Bureau of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea recently issued four kinds of new stamps.
					 Printed in the stamps are posters on such themes as "Soldiers of General Are Always Ready for Action" and "Please Give Us Order for Action".
					
					 They feature the will and spirit of the DPRK servicepersons and people to stamp out the provokers at one stroke, once an order is given, and achieve the national reunification without fail.

articles.title: New Kind of Mineral Water Popular among DPRK People
articles.content:
New Kind of Mineral Water Popular among DPRK People
						
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- A new kind of drinking water, made up of valuable mineral substances extracted from Kumgang medical stone, is now popular among people in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The Kumgang medical stone is known for good effect on human body.
					
					 As a mineral supplementary drink, the water contains a big amount of more than 50 kinds of macronutrients and microelements such as calcium, magnesium, iron and manganese.
					
					 It is evaluated to be higher in quality than world-famous mineral waters.
					
					 The water helps activate metabolism and prevent or treat digestive trouble, circulatory diseases and nervous system disorders.
					
					 Its undiluted solution is applicable to making foodstuffs, medicines and cosmetics.
					
					 There are many stands serving this mineral water in different parts of the country, including Pyongyang and Sinuiju cities.

articles.title: "Chungsong" No. 1603, Vessel Used by Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
"Chungsong" No. 1603, Vessel Used by Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Displayed at the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun is the vessel "Chungsong (loyalty)" No. 1603, which was used by leader Kim Jong Il in his lifetime.
					 It was September 14, Juche 67 (1978) when he got aboard the ship for the first time. Since then, he had used it for more than 500 times to inspect military units and various sectors of the national economy over the past 30 odd years.
					
					 One day in September 1991 he set out on a journey, aboard the ship, to give field guidance.
					
					 Wind began blowing at dawn and turned to be a hurricane in the morning. The stormy wind caused huge waves which slashed windows and flooded the deck of the ship.
					
					 As the ship arrived in the destination, going through raging waters inch by inch, Kim Jong Il praised the crew for safely operating the ship even in the rough wind.
					
					 One day in January 2010, he got on the ship to make an inspection tour of a military unit. 
					
					 That day the sea recorded three-meter-high waves with wind speed of 15 meters per second. During its voyage the deck and all other parts of the ship were covered with thick ice, and at its destination crewmen could hardly find where a door-knob of the leader's cabin was. So, they cut and melted ice to open the door of his cabin.
					
					 But he was afraid of the safety of the ship's crewmen, advising officials to lay the deck with teakwood lest crewmen slip in such rough weather.
					
					 In such way, he made a long journey of field guidance and military inspection with this ship regardless of weather conditions to ensure the country's security and provide the people with better living conditions.
					
					 The ship "Chungsong" No. 1603 is one of reminders of the enduring feats Kim Jong Il performed for the people's wellbeing and the country's prosperity in his lifetime.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Stirring Up Hot Wind of Sports
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Stirring Up Hot Wind of Sports
						
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- It is the firm determination of the Workers' Party of Korea to turn the DPRK into a sports power by stirring up a hot wind of sports throughout the country and rapidly developing sports science and technology, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in its editorial.
					 Sports are important as they demonstrate the nation's dignity and spirit and its power, says the editorial, adding:
					
					 The field of sports is faced with an important task to make the flag of the country flutter at international games with the same spirit as displayed by the conquerors of space.
					
					 The sports persons of the country should make devoted efforts to add glory to the country with gold medals at games, deeply aware that they are taking charge of the responsible and honorable front to demonstrate the honor of the country.
					
					 To raise a hot wind of sports is the work for stepping up the building of a highly civilized socialist nation and an important requirement for creating a healthy and lively atmosphere in whole society.
					
					 When all people do their jobs in good health, it is possible to bring earlier the emergence of a thriving nation.
					
					 The Korean people are a revolutionary people who advance with hope for future and optimism under any difficult conditions.
					
					 No force can bring into submission the country full of dynamism and the Korean people replete with joy and optimism.
					
					 A hot wind of sports can be found everywhere in the DPRK.
					
					 This mounting zeal for sports helps reinforce collectivism and increase the competitive spirit and encourages people to nurture a good habit of mental power and mettle to overcome difficulties.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea's intention to train all people into indomitable revolutionaries, equipped with the revolutionary idea of Juche and fully prepared mentally and physically, is fully demonstrating its validity and vitality in practice.
					
					 The campaign for turning the DPRK into a sports power is sure to prove successful thanks to the leadership of the great WPK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Observes First Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Inspection of Panmunjom
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Observes First Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Inspection of Panmunjom
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday dedicates a bylined article to the first anniversary of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un's inspection of Panmunjom.
					 The article says:
					
					 Panmunjom is the biggest hotspot in the world and forefront area where a war may break out anytime due to the enemies' ceaseless moves for a war against the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's inspection of Panmunjom marked a historic event which internally and externally demonstrated his firm will to achieve a final victory in the cause of national reunification in the near future, true to the behests of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and dealt hard blows at the enemies' moves for provocation and aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 It is the unshakable will of Kim Jong Un to build a reunified thriving nation on the land of three thousand ri by realizing the lifelong desire of the Generalissimos without fail.
					
					 Kim Jong Un inspected Panmunjom, calm and composed, regarding the warmongers' reckless saber-rattling as nothing but bluffing of cowards. This pluck and mettle which stunned the world sent shivers down the spines of the enemies.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet forces are now busy kicking up a frantic confrontation racket against the DPRK over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes and nuclear test for defending its sovereignty.
					
					 The warmongers are staging large-scale Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military maneuvers, bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war in a bid to threaten the DPRK again and realize their scenario to invade it.
					
					 It is the mettle of the army and people of the DPRK to return fire for fire and not to show any mercy to any aggressors' attempt to hurt it even a bit.
					
					 They, united close around Kim Jong Un, will wipe out the aggressors to the last man through a final all-out action for national reunification and thus clearly demonstrate the might of the army of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: U.S. Military Challenge to DPRK Will Be Met by Strong Counteraction: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
U.S. Military Challenge to DPRK Will Be Met by Strong Counteraction: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- If the U.S. sticks to its hostile approach towards the DPRK to the last and leads the situation on the Korean Peninsula to a complicated phase, the DPRK will be left with no option but to take stronger countermeasures one after another.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday warns this in a bylined article.
					
					 A touch-and-go situation is prevailing on the peninsula owing to the U.S. and its allies' vicious hostile actions against the DPRK over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes and the step for bolstering up its nuclear deterrent for defence of its sovereignty and due to their madcap war maneuvers.
					
					 Huge U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and latest nuclear offensive means have already been deployed in south Korea and its vicinity and large forces of the three services of the army in south Korea and its every ministry and agency have been put on a de facto wartime posture. 
					
					 This goes to clearly prove that the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills may develop into a real war any time. 
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are escalating the military confrontation with the DPRK. This fact once again proves how just the DPRK was when it had access to powerful nuclear deterrent for self-defence to cope with the hostile forces' increasing threat of aggression. 
					
					 The DPRK's access to nuclear deterrent constitutes a great contribution not only to the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula but to the peace in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world. Had the DPRK failed to bolster up war deterrent in every way to cope with the evermore undisguised new war moves of the U.S., a nuclear war would have broken out on the peninsula more than ten times and humankind would have undergone the same nuclear disasters as those in Hiroshima and Nagasaki.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrent has been diversified and its performance has grown stronger than ever before. This serves as an iron fist for foiling the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces' military provocations and war moves against the DPRK.
					
					 It is the steadfast stand of the DPRK to decisively react to military pressure with an all-out action and a nuclear threat with nuclear deterrent for self-defence, concludes the article.

articles.title: Policy of Gender Discrimination, U.S.-South Korea Joint Military Exercises under Fire
articles.content:
Policy of Gender Discrimination, U.S.-South Korea Joint Military Exercises under Fire
						
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The Women's Solidarity of south Korea made public a commentary on March 1, denouncing the unpopular policy of gender discrimination and the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises.
					 Growing stronger in society are voices demanding the guarantee of the women's right to work and human rights, the commentary noted, and went on:
					
					 It is necessary to put an end to the policy of gender discrimination as early as possible in order to free the women undergoing sufferings due to harsh discrimination and poverty, left without stable jobs.
					
					 The commentary also accused the U.S. and south Korean authorities of staging Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military maneuvers, increasing the danger of war on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Women will also join in the actions for peace, the commentary said, adding that they would conduct diverse activities including press conference in demand of a stop to the joint military exercises and negotiations for peace as immediate tasks.

articles.title: Stop to Crackdown on Actions for Settlement of Sexual Slavery Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Stop to Crackdown on Actions for Settlement of Sexual Slavery Called for in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Civic and social organizations in south Korea including the Changwon Citizens Council with Grandmothers Former Sexual Slaves for the Imperial Japanese Army held a press conference in Changwon, South Kyongsang Province on March 1. At the conference they denounced the Japanese right-wing forces for clamping down the movement for a solution to the issue of sexual slavery.
					 Speakers accused the Japanese right-wing forces and police of distorting historical facts while making reckless remarks denying Japan's past crimes and cracking down on the movement for the settlement of the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					
					 This reminds one of the period of the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule over Korea when they suppressed the organizations of the independence movement and their participants, they deplored.
					
					 The above-said unreasonable and violent crackdown is a shameless act of disregarding the pain of the victims of the sexual slavery and negating the crimes, they noted, adding:
					
					 It is hard to say such repressive campaign is not connected with the attempt of the Abe government and political forces to revive militarism and turn Japan into a military giant.
					
					 Japan should stop cracking down on the movement for the settlement of the sexual slavery and the south Korean authorities make positive efforts to seek a solution to the issue.

articles.title: U.S. Can Never Overcome North: S. Korean Paper
articles.content:
U.S. Can Never Overcome North: S. Korean Paper
						
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Jaju Minbo carried an article written by poet Jong Sol Gyo under the title "The U.S. can never overcome the north" on Feb. 28.
					 The article said that the on-going Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises are aimed to reduce the north to ashes with the navy and air force.
					
					 The U.S., however, can never defeat the north in such way, it noted, and went on:
					
					 The lesson taught by the June 25 War (Korean War) proves it.
					
					 To provoke the north which has even the U.S. in its striking range will cause self-destruction.
					
					 It is little short of jumping into fire with faggot on one's back to try to start a war, risking ruin.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised Abroad 
zczc
					e030402 - Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised Abroad 
						
					
					 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Brazilian and French organizations and an international body posted on their websites special write-ups illustrated with a portrait of leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted an article "The great leader Kim Jong Il and snow" accompanied with the pictures of his birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp and Kimjongilia on Feb. 12. 
					
					 The article said that snow is the first thing which comes into one's  mind when remembering the life of Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, as he lived a pure life  like snow. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 He made sure that the Korean people held President Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the sun of Juche and eternal president of the DPRK.  There was nothing for Kim Jong Il himself during his life. 
					
					 It gave a detailed account of the fact that he took warm care of all people and devoted himself to the Korean people and the world progressives. 
					
					 Thanks to his self-sacrificing dedication socialism was defended in the DPRK and a new turning phase for building a thriving nation was opened there, it stressed, and went on: 
					
					 His noble life will always be remembered by the Korean people and progressive mankind.
					
					 The French Group for the Study of the Juche and Songun Idea in an article entitled "Leader Kim Jong Il and Songun politics" introduced the essence, justice and vitality of the Songun politics. 
					
					 The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain edited articles titled "Heritage of leader Kim Jong Il," "Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism" and "Songun Korea" under the caption "February 16, the Day of the Shining Star" illustrated with his pictures.

articles.title: DPRK's Just Stand Supported by Bangladeshi Personage
articles.content:
DPRK's Just Stand Supported by Bangladeshi Personage
						
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Siyed Abu Zahar Ahmed, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Bangladesh Communist Party, on Feb. 23 made public a statement in support of the statement of a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry on the successful third underground nuclear test conducted  to cope with the U.S. hostile acts.
					 He said:
					
					 The third underground nuclear test of the DPRK was a decisive step for self-defence to cope with the U.S. hostile acts and just one in line with any international law. 
					
					 The U.S. cooked up a "resolution on sanctions" at the UN Security Council, taking issue with the DPRK's satellite launch only. 
					
					 It is the violation of international law and a height of the application of double standards. 
					
					 I extend solidarity to the Korean people in their just struggle for defending the country and nation from the imperialists' aggression and unequivocally support the statement issued by a spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry.

articles.title: Int'l Organization's Official Condemns U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Int'l Organization's Official Condemns U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Guy Dupre, secretary general of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea, issued a statement on Feb. 23 denouncing the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					 The statement said escalated tension on the Korean Peninsula is a product of the U.S. policy of pursuing confrontation with the DPRK. 
					
					 It went on: The U.S. is intensifying its arbitrary actions to impose new "sanctions" on the DPRK through the U.N. Security Council, while taking issue with its satellite launch for peaceful purposes and nuclear test for defending its sovereignty.
					
					 There were more than 2 000 nuclear tests and over 9 000 satellite launches in the UN history, but never has there been such a UNSC's resolution that banned any country from conducting a nuclear test and launching satellite.
					
					 The UNSC's "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK was an expression of serious prejudice and double-standard policy which go quite contrary to the international organ's mission to respect the sovereignty of its member states and ensure the world peace and security.
					
					 The UNSC should condemn the U.S. for its military confrontation policy extremely escalating the tension by threat of a nuclear attack, not blaming the DPRK, which is using the outer space for peaceful purposes in line with its legitimate right as a sovereign state.
					
					 The peace-loving and progressive forces on the globe should conduct the solidarity movement for urging the U.S. to come out to negotiations to immediately defuse the tension on the Korean Peninsula mounting day by day due to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, and sign a peace treaty with it.

articles.title: DPRK's Nuclear Test, Step for Legitimate Self-Defence: Romanian Political Party
articles.content:
DPRK's Nuclear Test, Step for Legitimate Self-Defence: Romanian Political Party
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The Socialist Party of Romania issued a statement on Feb. 19 in support of the DPRK's third underground nuclear test.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Korean Peninsula is inching close to the touch-and-go situation.
					
					 The U.S. being engrossed in high-handed and arbitrary practices while styling itself the world's only super power is staging war drills against the DPRK under various codenames in the Korean Peninsula and in seas around it.
					
					 It got the UN Security Council to adopt a "resolution on sanctions" on the DPRK. This compelled the DPRK to take tougher countermeasure for self-defence.
					
					 The third underground nuclear test conducted by the DPRK was a step for defending itself.
					
					 The world progressives are deeply concerned about the tension on the Korean Peninsula escalating day by day and strongly demanding the U.S. abandon its hostile policy toward the DPRK and immediately withdraw its troops from south Korea.
					
					 The Supreme Council and all the members of the Socialist Party of Romania and followers of the Juche idea positively support the just struggle of the Korean people who declared a sacred war with the U.S., and will always fight in the anti-imperialist front shoulder to shoulder with them.

articles.title: Prueba nuclear de Corea es contramedida frente a actos hostiles de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Prueba nuclear de Corea es contramedida frente a actos hostiles de EE.UU.
						
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ACNC) -- La tercera prueba nuclear de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea es una contramedida real para defender su soberania y seguridad frente a la hostilidad brutal de Estados Unidos que violo flagrantemente el derecho de ella a lanzar el satelite artificial con fines pacificos.
					Asi aclaro el representante coreano en su discurso pronunciado el 27 de febrero en la sesion plenaria de la Conferencia de Ginebra sobre el Desarme.
					
					Desde el principio, la RPDC no tenia el plan ni necesidad de realizar la tercera prueba nuclear,  recalco y prosiguio.
					
					Pero, EE.UU. puso obstaculos por todos los medios para que la RPDC no dedicara sus esfuerzos principales a la construccion economica y la mejora de vida del pueblo en un ambiente pacifico y estable.
					
					Tales actos fueron confirmados de manera concentrada en diciembre del ano pasado, cuando la RPDC lanzo exitosamente la unidad no.2 del satelite artificial "Kwangmyongsong-3" en el marco de ejercicio del derecho legal de un Estado soberano segun la ley internacional.
					
					Sin embargo, el imperio volvio a abusar del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU para cuestionar solo el lanzamiento de satelite de la RPDC.
					
					La politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU. llego a una etapa tan peligrosa que no podemos dedicar los esfuerzos a la construccion economica y la mejora de la vida del pueblo, lo que nos obligo a tomar la decision importante  de realizar la tercera prueba nuclear subterranea.
					
					La responsabilidad de la actual situacion tan inminente creada en la Peninsula Coreana se debe enteramente al imperio yanqui.
					
					Resulta un sofisma carente de la teoria elemental y la burla a la sociedad internacional la insistencia de EE.UU. en que el lanzamiento de satelite de la RPDC constituye una "amenaza a la paz y seguridad internacionales" porque uso el "misil balistico".
					
					Entre los paises miembros de la ONU,  Estados Unidos fue  el  lanzador de mayores satelites, inclusive los militares y misiles balisticos intercontinentales.
					
					Segun la teoria del imperio, el amenazador principal a la paz y seguridad del mundo es el mismo, objeto a ser acusado antes que nadie.
					
					Tal pais insiste en que solamente RPDC no debe realizar la prueba nuclear ni lanzar el satelite, lo cual es la violacion de la ley internacional y maximo testimonio de la pauta de doble rasero.
					
					No deberan ser tolerados mas los actos de EE.UU. que abusa del CS de la ONU como mecanismo de la politica hostil a la RPDC, violando gravemente el derecho soberano de esta al uso pacifico del cosmos.
					
					Aunque sea tarde, el imperio tendra que optar uno de dos dilemas: abrir la coyuntura de alivio y estabilidad respetando el derecho de la RPDC al lanzamiento de satelites o tomar el actual camino errado hacia la explosion de la situacion persiguiendo hasta el fin la politica hostil anti-RPDC.
					
					Al final, el representante coreano expuso la esperanza de que la sesion plenaria preste una merecida atencion a que la esencia de la grave situacion creada en la Peninsula Coreana es un problema serio relacionado con la defensa o la violencia de la soberania de un pais miembro de la ONU.

articles.title: Inspeccion de Kim Jong Un a Phanmunjom difunde a coreanos conviccion invincible
articles.content:
Inspeccion de Kim Jong Un a Phanmunjom difunde a coreanos conviccion invencible
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ACNC) -- Phanmunjom de Corea es uno de los puestos mas candentes de primera linea del frente.
					Precisamente, en ese lugar los agresores norteamericanos, vencidos en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (junio de 1950-julio de 1953), firmaron el documento de acuerdo de armisticio.
					
					El imperio y la banda titere del Sur de Corea enfrascados en la provocacion de agresion a la parte nortena de la Republica, cometieron solo de enero a julio de 1976 en la zona de guardia comun en Phanmunjom mas de 400 actos hostiles.
					
					Despues, provocando incesantemente inclusive el sensacional "incidente en Phanmunjom" en agosto de 1976 y el de tiro en Phanmunjom en noviembre de 1984, convirtieron el lugar en la zona mas tirante.
					
					Con la firme voluntad de lograr la causa historica de la reunificacion de la patria tras poner fin a la division nacional impuesta por las fuerzas foraneas, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un realizo un dia de marzo del 101 (2012) de la Era Juche una inspeccion a Phanmunjom donde los fusiles estan frente a frente.
					
					Mirando la lapida con firma del Presidente Kim Il Sung, erguida en ese lugar, el Comandante Supremo recordo las hazanas inmortales de el quien dedico todo lo suyo para la reunificacion del pais.
					
					Ese dia, el Mariscal se cercioro de la situacion de los enemigos desde el mirador de pabellon Phanmun y recorrio varios puntos de Phanmunjom, ocasion en la cual dijo que los militares y civiles coreanos deben glorificar de generacion en generacion las proezas de la Corea heroica, que asombro al mundo tras rechazar a los yanquis y sus fuerzas aliadas imperialistas, e imponer a los enemigos firmar el acta de capitulacion si se estalla la guerra.
					
					La inspeccion del Mariscal a Phanmunjom en aquel momento en que se creo la situacion inminente debido a los peligrosos ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Foal Eagle" del imperio y los belicistas surcoreanos, sirvio de un gran acontecimiento que difundio la firme confianza y animo en la victoria entre los militares y civiles coreanos, bien dispuestos a entrar en el combate real.
					
					Guardando en el corazon el honor de aquel dia de hace un ano, los militares de Phanmunjom se mantienen en la disposicion de lograr sin falta la empresa historica de reintegracion territorial, si se de la orden del Comandante Supremo.
					
					En el area de Phanmunjom se hallan la lapida con firma del Presidente Kim Il Sung, la sala de negociaciones de armisticio y el edificio donde se firmo el Acuerdo de Armisticio, que transmiten las hazanas  victoriosas del pueblo coreano en la guerra coreana, y los pabellones Phanmun y Thong-il.

articles.title: Emitidos nuevos sellos en RPDC
articles.content:
Emitidos nuevos sellos en RPDC
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ACNC) -- Quedaron emitidos 4 sellos nuevos en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					En ellos se ven las pancartas tituladas "!Los soldados del General estan siempre preparados!", "!Ordene!", "!Seamos fusiles y bombas en la defensa a ultranza al Comite Central del Partido como los combatientes del 7o Regimiento que defendieron la comandancia de la revolucion!" y otras.
					
					Los sellos dejan conocer la voluntad del ejercito y pueblo coreanos de destruir de un tiron el bastion de los enemigos cuando se les de la orden y lograr sin falta la reunificacion de la patria.

articles.title: Creadas poesias alusivas a enfrentamiento total
articles.content:
Creadas poesias alusivas a enfrentamiento total
						
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ACNC) -- Los poetas del Comite Central de la Union de Escritores de Corea crearon muchas poesias que dan la conviccion y el animo a los militares y civiles entrados en el enfrentamiento total contra los yanquis.
					Las poesias "Cielo de Corea" y "Cubriremos el cielo con satelites" reflejan la ferrea voluntad del ejercito y pueblo coreanos de poner de pleno manifiesto el poderio de la Corea del Songun al lanzar mucho mas satelites.
					
					"Corea responde", "Exclamacion de Corea" y otras piezas dan a conocer la conviccion del pueblo coreano que aprecia mas que su vida la dignidad y soberania de la nacion y continua invariablemente el camino del Songun para defenderlas.
					
					"Sentenciamos el arruinamiento del imperialismo yanqui" y "Resuena el trueno nuclear" y otras poesias demuestran el impetu de militares y civiles de asestar un golpe demoledor al imperio yanqui y sus satelites que se enfrascan a la campana hostil anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea cuestionando el legitimo lanzamiento de satelite y el fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear para la defensa de la soberania de la RPDC.
